contest-event.event-date: Sept. 28, 1912 D National Championship of Great Britain (Crystal Palace) National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) 1 Test Piece Contest National Championship of Great Britain (Finals) national-finals-championship-section European Championships The current Nationals contest began in 1900, but there was a previous 'Nationals' contest run 40 years earlier: Enderby Jackson's Great National Contest. Championship William Tell [arr. Rimmer] Crystal Palace (Concert Hall), Crystal Palace Park, Sydenham, County of London, England, UK 1st: 40 Pounds plus the 1000 Guinea Trophy 2nd: 30 Pounds plus the Daily Telegraph Challenge Cup 3rd: 20 Pounds 4th: 16 Pounds 5th: 12 Pounds 6th: 10 Pounds 7th: 5 Pounds Feb. 7, 2011, 8:18 p.m. Aug. 28, 2013, 1:37 p.m. 1 St. Hilda Colliery William Halliwell 2 Irwell Springs William Halliwell 3 Fodens Band William Halliwell 4 Black Dyke Band J.
